name: Track Game
description:
Track Game is an arcade, stylized, racing game.

This is only 1% of the potential of the game and I will improve it every day.

Tomorrow I will upload a new devlog to show a new feature (not included in this version)

What I did the last week:

  • 2 new tracks 
  • Pause Menu 
  • Name for tracks  
  • Track selection Panel 
  • Bug Fixes 
  • Switched to a new ad provider to increase monetization 
  • Handling Fixes on various cars 
  • Setup for alpha version 
  • Wrong direction indicator 
  • Fixed ads problem with loading a track 
  • New Track System 
  • Reworked statistics system 
  • Alpha version of the Tuning system 
  • Alpha version of the Customization system
  • Modified save system

My plan for the game:

  • I will improve the UI 
  • I will improve the tuning system, both aesthetics and performance 
  • Manual shifting 
  • Drifting
  • Multiplayer 
  • I will add as soon as possible race with AIs and some new tracks

Do you have any ideas for the game? Here is where you can find me on social media

Instagram
Youtube
